Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements for the final image:

*   Orange fur of fox character
*   White/cream fur accents of fox character (chest, muzzle, tail tip)
*   Dark brown ear tips of fox character
*   Dark brown feet of fox character
*   2D cartoon art style of fox character
*   Sitting pose of fox character
*   Curled tail of fox character
*   Closed/squinting eyes of fox character
*   Subtle smile of fox character
*   Small original shadow beneath fox character (as in Figure 1)
*   Asphalt road surface of alley
*   "SLOW" road marking
*   White arrow road marking
*   Double yellow road lines
*   White-walled buildings
*   External air conditioning units
*   Potted plants
*   Yellow bollards
*   Green tree foliage
*   Distant high-rise building
*   Bright cloudy sky
